is used to push a value on to the stack. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

op_constant is often used with the [[op_argument]].

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(display "hello")</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant "hello"
   [argument
   [constant 1
   [argument
   [refer-global "display"
   [apply]]]]]]
[halt]]</code></pre>
